trans-unit.source: Represents a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Drawing" /> object that renders a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.GlyphRun" />.
trans-unit.target: 表示一个呈现 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Drawing" /> 的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.GlyphRun" /> 对象。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Media.GlyphRun> object represents a sequence of glyphs from a single face of a single font at a single size, and with a single rendering style.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Media.GlyphRun>对象表示的标志符号的序列中的一种字体在单个大小，并且一种呈现样式的单个字形。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Media.GlyphRun> contains font details such as glyph indices and individual glyph positions.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Media.GlyphRun> 包含字体标志符号索引和各个标志符号位置等的详细信息。

trans-unit.source: In addition, <xref:System.Windows.Media.GlyphRun> contains the original Unicode code points the run was generated from, character to glyph buffer offset mapping information, and per-character and per-glyph flags.
trans-unit.target: 此外，<xref:System.Windows.Media.GlyphRun>包含从中，生成运行的原始 Unicode 码位字符标志符号缓冲区偏移量的映射信息，和每个字符以及每个标志符号标志。

trans-unit.source: Each glyph in a <xref:System.Windows.Media.GlyphRun> defines metrics that specify how it aligns with other <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Glyphs>.
trans-unit.target: 在每个字形<xref:System.Windows.Media.GlyphRun>定义度量值，指定与其他的对齐方式<xref:System.Windows.Documents.Glyphs>。

trans-unit.source: The following graphic defines the various typographic qualities of two different glyph characters.
trans-unit.target: 以下图形定义两种不同字形字符的各种排版品质。

trans-unit.source: ![Diagraph of glyph measurements](~/add/media/glyph-example.png "Diagraph of glyph measurements")
trans-unit.target: ![标志符号度量示意图](~/add/media/glyph-example.png "标志符号度量示意图")

trans-unit.source: Various typographic qualities of two different glyph characters
trans-unit.target: 两个不同的标志符号字符的各种版式质量

trans-unit.source: **Freezable Features:** A <xref:System.Windows.Media.GlyphRunDrawing> is a type of <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> object and therefore can be frozen to improve performance.
trans-unit.target: **可冻结功能：** A<xref:System.Windows.Media.GlyphRunDrawing>是一种<xref:System.Windows.Freezable>对象，因此可以冻结以提高性能。

trans-unit.source: For information about <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> features, such as freezing and cloning, see the [Freezable Objects Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/freezable-objects-overview.md).
trans-unit.target: 璝惠<xref:System.Windows.Freezable>功能，如冻结和克隆，请参阅[可冻结对象概述](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/freezable-objects-overview.md)。

trans-unit.source: **Caution:** <xref:System.Windows.Media.GlyphRunDrawing> objects do not support partial trust execution.
trans-unit.target: **注意：** <xref:System.Windows.Media.GlyphRunDrawing>对象不支持部分信任的执行。

trans-unit.source: An application must have full trust permissions to use <xref:System.Windows.Media.GlyphRunDrawing> objects.
trans-unit.target: 应用程序必须具有完全信任权限，才能使用<xref:System.Windows.Media.GlyphRunDrawing>对象。

trans-unit.source: The following example uses a <xref:System.Windows.Media.GlyphRunDrawing> to draw the text "Hello World".
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例使用<xref:System.Windows.Media.GlyphRunDrawing>来绘制文本"Hello World"。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Windows.Media.GlyphRun> is a low-level object intended for use with fixed-format document presentation and print scenarios.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Windows.Media.GlyphRun>适用于固定格式的文档演示文稿和打印的方案是低级别对象。

trans-unit.source: A simpler way to draw text to the screen is to use a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Label> or a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBlock>.
trans-unit.target: 屏幕上绘制文本的简单办法是使用<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Label>或<xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBlock>。

trans-unit.source: For more information about <xref:System.Windows.Media.GlyphRun>, see the [Introduction to the GlyphRun Object and Glyphs Element](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/introduction-to-the-glyphrun-object-and-glyphs-element.md) overview.
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息<xref:System.Windows.Media.GlyphRun>，请参阅[简介 GlyphRun 对象和标志符号元素](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/introduction-to-the-glyphrun-object-and-glyphs-element.md)概述。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.GlyphRunDrawing" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.GlyphRunDrawing" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.GlyphRunDrawing" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.GlyphRunDrawing" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: The foreground brush to use for the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.GlyphRunDrawing" />.
trans-unit.target: 要用于 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.GlyphRunDrawing" /> 的前景画笔。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.GlyphRun" /> to use in this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.GlyphRunDrawing" />.
trans-unit.target: 要在此 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.GlyphRun" /> 中使用的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.GlyphRunDrawing" />。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.GlyphRunDrawing" /> class by specifying the foreground brush and <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.GlyphRun" />.
trans-unit.target: 通过指定前景画笔和 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.GlyphRunDrawing" /> 来初始化 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.GlyphRun" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: Creates a modifiable clone of this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.GlyphRunDrawing" />, making deep copies of this object's values.
trans-unit.target: 创建此 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.GlyphRunDrawing" /> 的可修改克隆，从而深度复制此对象的值。

trans-unit.source: When copying dependency properties, this method copies resource references and data bindings (but they might no longer resolve) but not animations or their current values.
trans-unit.target: 在复制依赖项属性时，此方法会复制资源引用和数据绑定（但可能不再解析），但不复制动画或其当前值。

trans-unit.source: A modifiable clone of the current object.
trans-unit.target: 当前对象的可修改复本。

trans-unit.source: The cloned object's <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> property will be <see langword="false" /> even if the source's <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> property was <see langword="true." />
trans-unit.target: 即使源的 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> 属性为 <see langword="true." />，所克隆的对象的 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> 属性也将为 <see langword="false" />

trans-unit.source: This method is used to produce modifiable copies of frozen <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> objects (or any <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> object).
trans-unit.target: 此方法用于生成的可修改副本冻结<xref:System.Windows.Freezable>对象 (或任何<xref:System.Windows.Freezable>对象)。

trans-unit.source: For convenience, this method shadows the inherited version with a strongly typed implementation.
trans-unit.target: 为方便起见，此方法将隐藏继承的强类型实现的版本。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: 有关详情，请参阅<xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.source: Creates a modifiable clone of this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.GlyphRunDrawing" /> object, making deep copies of this object's current values.
trans-unit.target: 创建此 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.GlyphRunDrawing" /> 对象的可修改复本，从而深度复制此对象的当前值。

trans-unit.source: Resource references, data bindings, and animations are not copied, but their current values are.
trans-unit.target: 不复制资源引用、数据绑定和动画，而是复制其当前值。

trans-unit.source: A modifiable clone of the current object.
trans-unit.target: 当前对象的可修改复本。

trans-unit.source: The cloned object's <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> property will be <see langword="false" /> even if the source's <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> property was <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: 即使源的 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> 属性为 <see langword="true" />，所克隆的对象的 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> 属性也将为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: This method is used to produce modifiable copies of frozen <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> objects (or any <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> object).
trans-unit.target: 此方法用于生成的可修改副本冻结<xref:System.Windows.Freezable>对象 (或任何<xref:System.Windows.Freezable>对象)。

trans-unit.source: For convenience, this method shadows the inherited version with a strongly typed implementation.
trans-unit.target: 为方便起见，此方法将隐藏继承的强类型实现的版本。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CloneCurrentValue%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: 有关详情，请参阅<xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CloneCurrentValue%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the foreground brush of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.GlyphRunDrawing" />.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.GlyphRunDrawing" /> 的前景画笔。

trans-unit.source: The brush that paints the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.GlyphRun" />.
trans-unit.target: 绘制 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.GlyphRun" /> 的画笔。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: Dependency Property Information
trans-unit.target: 依赖项属性信息

trans-unit.source: Identifier field
trans-unit.target: 标识符字段

trans-unit.source: Metadata properties set to `true`
trans-unit.target: 元数据属性设置为 `true`

trans-unit.source: None
trans-unit.target: 无

trans-unit.source: The following example uses a <xref:System.Windows.Media.GlyphRunDrawing> to draw the text "Hello World".
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例使用<xref:System.Windows.Media.GlyphRunDrawing>来绘制文本"Hello World"。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Windows.Media.GlyphRun> is a low-level object intended for use with fixed-format document presentation and print scenarios.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Windows.Media.GlyphRun>适用于固定格式的文档演示文稿和打印的方案是低级别对象。

trans-unit.source: A simpler way to draw text to the screen is to use a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Label> or a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBlock>.
trans-unit.target: 屏幕上绘制文本的简单办法是使用<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Label>或<xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBlock>。

trans-unit.source: For more information about <xref:System.Windows.Media.GlyphRun>, see the [Introduction to the GlyphRun Object and Glyphs Element](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/introduction-to-the-glyphrun-object-and-glyphs-element.md) overview.
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息<xref:System.Windows.Media.GlyphRun>，请参阅[简介 GlyphRun 对象和标志符号元素](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/introduction-to-the-glyphrun-object-and-glyphs-element.md)概述。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.GlyphRunDrawing.ForegroundBrush" /> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 标识 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.GlyphRunDrawing.ForegroundBrush" /> 依赖项属性。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.GlyphRun" /> that describes the text to draw.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置描述要绘制的文本的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.GlyphRun" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.GlyphRun" /> that describes the text to draw.
trans-unit.target: 描述要绘制的文本的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.GlyphRun" />。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: Dependency Property Information
trans-unit.target: 依赖项属性信息

trans-unit.source: Identifier field
trans-unit.target: 标识符字段

trans-unit.source: Metadata properties set to `true`
trans-unit.target: 元数据属性设置为 `true`

trans-unit.source: None
trans-unit.target: 无

trans-unit.source: The following example uses a <xref:System.Windows.Media.GlyphRunDrawing> to draw the text "Hello World".
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例使用<xref:System.Windows.Media.GlyphRunDrawing>来绘制文本"Hello World"。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Windows.Media.GlyphRun> is a low-level object intended for use with fixed-format document presentation and print scenarios.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Windows.Media.GlyphRun>适用于固定格式的文档演示文稿和打印的方案是低级别对象。

trans-unit.source: A simpler way to draw text to the screen is to use a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Label> or a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBlock>.
trans-unit.target: 屏幕上绘制文本的简单办法是使用<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Label>或<xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBlock>。

trans-unit.source: For more information about <xref:System.Windows.Media.GlyphRun>, see the [Introduction to the GlyphRun Object and Glyphs Element](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/introduction-to-the-glyphrun-object-and-glyphs-element.md) overview.
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息<xref:System.Windows.Media.GlyphRun>，请参阅[简介 GlyphRun 对象和标志符号元素](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/introduction-to-the-glyphrun-object-and-glyphs-element.md)概述。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.GlyphRunDrawing.GlyphRun" /> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 标识 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.GlyphRunDrawing.GlyphRun" /> 依赖项属性。
